RT @HeartDocTesla: @crescendo_cap I’ve been in $TSLA a long time. This is how the stock trades. It frustrates as many as possible before it…

- Bad press and toxic attacks on $TSLA community is a tactic that can backfire as the community is some of the 1st adopters of EV and passionate about ICE to EV changes
- it's important that they realize that for now their competition is internal between their own ICE and EV

- #EV will grow and capture most of the auto market in this decade and with it $TSLA and some new #EV startup will also capture lion share so its a moment of reckoning for few/all ICE players that new auto landscape will be different and supremacy will be lost

- What is good that instead of random experiments, most are trying to copy the $TSLA playbook, which was exactly the original mission of @Tesla --> Make #EV mainstream
- Old way of marketing, advertisement still a thing for them so there will be barbs exchanged

- On messaging and narrative, I am little careful as the senior management of these companies have got strategy more often wrong than right in last 15 yrs related to #EV
- Also their foray in #EV is forced single handily by $TSLA so it's not easy to digest at times
